import { useState } from 'react' import PatasImg from '../../images/patas.png' import { Input } from '../../components/Form/Input' import * as Styled from './styles' export const CreatePet = ()=>{ const [ pet, setPet ] = useState({}) const handleOnChange = (e)=>{ setPet({...pet, [e.targe.name] : e.targe.value}) } return(

Cadastrar Novo Pet

 ) }
